1.title: Chapter 1
1.plot: Chapter One: In an apocalyptic world rundown with zombies, where society has morphed into absurdity, where the only rule is the survival of the fittest and calling dibs on stuff; Lucas, a young loner, is in a pickle. He was followed by zombies, his hideout was compromised, & he's doomed; until an unexpected visit changes the scene.

2.title: Chapter 2
2.plot: The Second Chapter: An amnesiac Brette wakes up to face the fighting men. Masterfully, she calms things down and tells them what she remembers of her past. The three befriend one another, and it seems that Lucas has forgotten how to be social. When Duke takes first watch, things go south, and the group finds itself under attack.

3.title: Chapter 3
3.plot: The Third Chapter: While Lucas is in grave danger & Duke is down with a concussion, Brette shows that she's more than she meets the eye. After the group takes a breather, they bond over the previous events. While in dark corridors, at a different place, a mysterious man is about to speak...

4.title: Chapter 4
4.plot: The Penultimate Chapter: After finding out that sector X37 is doomed, there's no time to escape; With Duke at the helm, the three make some bold decisions. Outnumbered and stranded, they stay their ground with a few tricks up their sleeves and one or two bunnies in their hats, but all lead to an explosive end...

5.title: Chapter 5
5.plot: The Final Chapter: Surviving the blast, Lucas is disoriented and seems to drift into a different world. Duke & Brette recover, and just when they think it's over, an eager soldier blasts his way into their frame. The three reluctantly join him. While President Juan Cohen Smith reveals an important secret, we stay with a conjuring Lucas.

6.title: Chapter Z
6.plot: The Prequel Chapter: It's 696 Days earlier, and the epidemic is on the rise. We get an early glimpse into the past of our characters. This is day Zero of the new world-the beginning of a new era.

locations: Bushwick, Brooklyn, New York City, New York, USA::(location)
imdb.plot outline: The year is 2020. It's 696 days after the apocalypse...the zombie apocalypse. Food, water, and shelter are scarce in sector X37. Lucas, a clever, yet depressed, loner, decides to sit the apocalypse out and wait for a cure...or the army to win. One mistake and Lucas finds himself compromised and followed by the undead. Hope seems lost. Little did he know that someone else was following him.
imdb.title: Dead Land
plot: The year is 2020. It's 696 days after the apocalypse...the zombie apocalypse. Food, water, and shelter are scarce in sector X37. Lucas, a clever, yet depressed, loner, decides to sit the apocalypse out and wait for a cure...or the army to win. One mistake and Lucas finds himself compromised and followed by the undead. Hope seems lost. Little did he know that someone else was following him.::Edan Jacob Levy
